title: Celanese 's revenue 2007 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenue in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 7155.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 5082.0 was reached at Year 2009
